overview: Dan Byrne is an Electrical Engineering graduate from University College Cork, with over 30 years experience in senior management roles with Ford Motor Company, FAS, Apple Computer Inc and Digital Equipment Corporation. As Vice-President of Apple, he was responsible for all of its manufacturing, distribution, procurement and customer services for Europe and subsequently for the Americas. On returning to Europe from California, Dan was appointed Vice- President Operations for DECâ€™s PC Division. Since 1995, Dan has acted as Non-Executive Chairman of many companies in Ireland as well as being appointed by the Minister of Health as Vice- Chair of Irelandâ€™s Health, Information & Quality Authority. He is a co-founder of Lincor Solutions Ltd.
